product.longDescription:
Travel to paradise with this American Tourister X Disney hardside carry on! This bag will show off your personality while giving you all the bells and whistles you need while traveling!
• Telescopic steel tube trolley handle adjusts to the user's height
• Single Spinner American Tourister branded zipper pulls
• Stitch Printed ABS Hardside Split case with interior organization
• Expands 1.5"
• Airline Approved - this carry on is perfect to bring aboard most major airlines
• Weight: 7.28 lbs.

Body Dimensions: 19.49" x 13.27" x 9.02"
Overall Dimensions: 22.5" x 14.0" x 9.5"
product.shortDescription: Travel to paradise with this Disney x American Tourister Hardside Carry-On! This bag will show off your personality while giving you all the bells and whistles you need while traveling.

tooltip: Luggage is made from a vacuum-formed or pressure-formed shell. Strong ABS plastic, a temperature-resistant, highly impact-resistant material, is combined with a textured finish for the classic hardside look.
Does the case expand for added packing capacity?
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.pageTitle: Disney Stitch Carry-On Spinner | Hardside Luggage | American Tourister
product.pageDescription: Embark on your journey with the playful Disney Stitch Hardside Carry-On Luggage, designed for easy handling and durability. Get yours today!
product.pageKeywords: stitch suitcase,stitch luggage,lilo and stitch luggage,lilo and stitch suitcase,stitch carry on luggage,disney stitch suitcase,stitch luggage tag
